summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Beard Balm Leave In Conditioner - All Natural Beard Oil Wax for Beard Mustache & Hair Growth, Deep Beard Softener Cream Butter, Soothes Softens Tames & Styles Hair, Beard Care Kit Best Gift for Men Review Date: 2017/03/24 Store: Premium Nature Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.9 x 2.8 x 1.1 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Beard Balm', 'UPC': '857646006664'} Review Text: When you start getting a decent beard you realize the value of beard balms and oils. After you shampoo your beard you basically strip it of oils and dirt. That is good but you have to replace the oils if you don't want the dreaded beard itch and dandruff. This stuff does a great job at replacing the striped oils. It keeps my beard happy and that helps keep me happy. I also enjoy the sent of this balm. It is a mild sent of citrus orange in my opinion. I have used others with less sent and some that are much stronger. This sent seems to leave about an hour after applying.

Pros:
Natural ingredients
Good conditioning
Easy to use tin.
Easy to apply consistency

Cons:
If I use it multiple times in day I started to get zits in certain areas.

All in all. It is a good product and keeps my beard looking and feeling good. Review Title: Great conditioner. Keep your beard happy. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Argan Oil Hair Treatment Gift Set - 3 Value Pack: Morrocan Argan Oil Shampoo 8oz Conditioner 8 oz & Hair Heat Protectant Spray 4oz Sulfate Free Natural Damaged Hair Growth Repair Packaging May Vary Review Date: 2017/05/02 Store: Premium Nature Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 7.05 x 2.28 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'Argan Oil Hair Care Set', 'UPC': '857646006497'} Review Text: I was hesitant to try this because my hair is colored and very finicky. But I only have a few complaints. One con for me is these smell good (kinda like a unisex smell) but it's so strong that I almost got annoyed by it. Although I was amazed at how long the smell lasted after the initial wash. Another con for me is the conditioner is very thin substance. I have long hair and because of the consistency it takes a lot more conditioner than I was hoping. It did not fade my color which is a plus!! And I have to brag about how much I love the heat spray. It doesn't leave my hair looking greasy or a weird sticky texture after straightening my hair. I will be buying the heat spray again!! Overall great product just be aware of the scent. It smells good just very strong and if you aren't into unisex scent it will almost smells like cologne. Review Title: Great product strong scent Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Beard Care Gift Sets Best Mustache and Beard Growth Natural Beard Oil Beard Softener Conditioner Balm Butter And Wooden Comb Best Gift Idea for Men Premium Nature Review Date: 2017/06/24 Store: Premium Nature Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Coarse', 'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 4.02 x 2.36 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '857646006961'} Review Text: Alright, I have tried many different beard oils and typically I am unsatisfied with the smell in some sort of way. Most of them seem to have the smell of an old lady. Many are so strong they give me headaches as the sent rests under me nose all day.
None of this is the case with this beard oil. It has an amazing smell and the sent strength is just perfect. It has citrus woodsy type smell in my opinion. It gained the approval of my wife in the smells department and that is no easy feat. Plus it conditions and hydrates just as it should. It will keep your beardruff at bay.

I would most definitely recommend to a friend! Review Title: I finally found the one. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Blackhead Remover Peel Off Mask - Black Charcoal Face Mask Deep Detox Cleanser for Blackheads Pore Minimizer Facial Black Head Masks, Reduce Pores Pimple & Acne Absorbs Dirt & Oil Brighten & Purify Review Date: 2017/07/03 Store: Premium Nature Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.12 x 1.65 x 1.34 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Blackehead Remover Mask', 'UPC': '857646006619'} Review Text: I was quite amazed with this mask. It's not painful to remove and I actually saw results after first use! I will definitely be back for more Review Title: Amazing Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: URBEST Hair Coils, Tie Hair, Spiral Hair Ties,Phone Cord Hair Ties, Elastics Hair Tie, No Crease Hair Ties, Coil Ponytail Holder (Grey) Review Date: 2019/10/22 Store: URBEST Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'URBEST', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.6 x 0.75 inches; 1.59 Ounces'} Review Text: These spiral hair ties work nicely. I bought the small’s and they work for my daughters thick hair as well as my hair which is not as thick. I like them for many reasons: they have stretch but not too much and if they lose their stretchiness they’re easily fixed back to almost new with a little heat, they don’t pull my hair leaving me with a headache and they don’t leave the nasty ponytail crease in my hair. Review Title: Hello new hair ties Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Wax warmer Review Date: 2019/10/28 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 7.87 x 5.9 inches; 2.27 Pounds'} Review Text: I’m a bit of a waxing newb. However for the price I just had to try. This waxing kit is pretty self explanatory and easy to use. It works great as well. I will say that it took about 15 minutes longer than the directions said to fully heat up. However I’m pretty impressed with the results. It doesn’t take up a ton of space either. Review Title: Wax on wax off Daniel son Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2 Pieces Jade Stone Eyelash Extensions Round Jade Stone Adhesive Glue Lashes Pallet with 2 Pieces Straight and Curved Tip Tweezers Nipper for False Lash Application Tools (Green) Review Date: 2020/03/02 Store: Mudder Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mudder', 'Material': 'stainless steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.33 x 1.18 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Stone Adhesive', 'Item Form': 'Individual, Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 1.18 x 0.63 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: Great for lash extensions and easy to use. Review Title: Nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 48 Pieces Satin Hair Scrunchies Soft Silk Elastic Hair Bands Floral Solid Hair Ties Ropes Ponytail Holder Rubber Headband for Women Girls Hair Accessories Review Date: 2020/07/22 Store: Syhood Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Syhood', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '48', 'Package Dimensions': '10.25 x 8.5 x 0.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: Between myself and my daughter, we go through a lot of scrunchies. I really like the skinny scrunchies as they work better for my hair. But they’re hard to come by. This pack has a variety of designs, Colts, and material. The quality isn’t the best as a few of them seem like they’re pulling apart before ever getting used but the way we go through them it won’t be a deal breaker. Review Title: Vsco on budget Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** Strong interest in hair care products, particularly those designed for conditioning and protecting. Frequent purchases of natural oils and conditioners signify a preference for quality hair maintenance.
  
- **Beard Grooming:** Consistently seeks beard care products, favoring those with natural ingredients and pleasant, balanced scents. High satisfaction indicated with scents described as mild or citrusy, avoiding overly strong fragrances.
  
- **Product Quality:** Values products that provide effective results without negative side effects, such as irritation or residue. Generally expresses satisfaction with performance and ease of application.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** Displays sensitivity towards strong scents. Prefers products with moderate fragrances, expressing appreciation for those that do not overpower.

- **Skin Care Inclusion:** Engages in skin care through cleansing masks, showing an interest in products that offer detoxification and acne treatment.

- **Family-Oriented Purchases:** Buys a variety of hair accessories for use by both self and children, indicating a family-focused approach to personal grooming products.

- **Preference for Natural Ingredients:** Consistently favors products made with natural ingredients across various categories, signaling a health-conscious mindset in personal care choices.

Overall, the purchase history reveals a holistic approach to grooming, emphasizing quality, natural formulations, and sensory experience in selecting products.

target_interaction.title: Tiny little torcher devices
target_interaction.text: I wasn’t real impressed with these hair curlers. The hook kept breaking and it felt like I was ripping my hair out trying to pull them through the tube. I started with wet hair and I even put a curl enhancer in before starting the tubes. I let them air dry and put a hair dryer on them before I took them out. But I ended up with a frizzy mess that did have some definition but not enough to even want to attempt all that pain again
target_interaction.title_meta: 24 Pieces Hair Curlers Spiral Curls Styling Kit, No Heat Hair Rollers Spiral Styling Curlers Heatless Wave Style Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Long Hair Styling Tools (11.8 Inches)
